channel.title: Scala on Stefan Gloutnikov
channel.description: Recent content in Scala on Stefan Gloutnikov

item.title: Identifying and Graphing Missing Time Series Data with Apache Spark and Highcharts
item.description: When performing my analysis and graphing for my previous post I ran into a problem of identifying and displaying missing time series data. From a series of data that occurs daily, I wanted to identify if there were missing days, and to graph them so that they can easily be seen.

item.title: Analyzing SiriusXM's The Heat "Now Playing" Data with Apache Spark
item.description: My SiriusXM tracker for ‘The Heat’ radio station has now been running since the summer of 2016 and has collected a good amount of data. It seemed like a great opportunity to make use of this data for getting some insight into what songs/artists/albums have been popular throughout the months, and also get some Spark practice under my belt.

item.title: Using Apache Spark with MongoDB
item.description: This example will go over setting up a simple Scala project in which we will access a Mongo Database and perform read/write operations. In order to access MongoDB from spark we will need the MongoDB Connector for Spark.
